text: It is a pity how so many can't conduct a respectful debate on Twitter. One negative voice aimed at me on Twitter has the incredible power to drown out a fifty positive ones. One of the greatest things I can achieve is to never let it. As a result I use the block button actively.
And, poof, they go away. Enjoy the weekend. PS $TWTR is one of my three largest longs!
I tried to be civil- that was wasn’t effective so you are blocked. But good luck investing.
They are not trading gurus -- they are often merchants of attention trying to sell their own (typically losing) services to unsuspecting and impressionable viewers.

Gus, respectfully I read your thread. You are off base factually on numerous counts. Most importantly, on real GDP growth under Trump. A brief sugar high in 2018 (after tax cuts) has reverted to trend line or below trend line growth now. bloomberg.com/opinion/articl…

Moreover (and again respectfully) a number of your economic theories are incorrect and don't past muster. Your thread is deeply pro Trump (which is your prerogative) but your interpretation of the success of Pres economic policies - which trickled up and not down - are wrong.
You importantly failed to recognize the need for fiscal spending to lead us out of The Great Recession in 2007-08 which was inherited by the previous President.
